text.tspan: Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion and randomly select a Complication.
Success.Effects are Weakened and Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion.
Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion or Effects are Weakened.
You may choose Strengthened, if you do, Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion.
Casting Exhaustion - Each level of Casting Exhaustion
Inflicts a -1 penalty to Casting Checks. Remove all
Casting Exhaustion at the end of a Full Rest.
Select an Invocation and make a Casting Check.
Outside of Combat you do not need to strain to perform
Channeling - The Character can not Cast another
Invocation with a duration. Additionally, any time that
Character Suffers Damage they must make a Simplified
Casting Check. On Any Failure the Effects of the
Invocation ends and the Channeling Condition is
removed from the Character. Additionally, as a Reaction
the Character can choose to end the Invocation and
